title: Oath Keepers leader Stewart Rhodes tried to contact Trump during the January 6 Capitol attack, court documents reveal - CBS News
content:
1. Oath Keepers leader Stewart Rhodes tried to contact Trump during the January 6 Capitol attack, court documents reveal  CBS News
  2. Top Oath Keepers member says he overheard extremist group's leader trying to connect with Trump after US Capitol riot  CNN
  3. Oath Keeper leader William Todd Wilson of NC pleaded guilty to sedition in Jan. 6 Capitol riot  The Washington Post
  4. Third Oath Keepers member pleads guilty; U.S. prepares for influx of migrants  CBS News
  5. Oath Keepers leader asked to speak with Trump on January 6: court filing  Business Insider
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The allegation came from the plea agreement of one-time Rhodes ally William Wilson, who admitted to seditious conspiracy on Wednesday.
